courses.title: Summit 101: Contributor Foundations
completion_criteria: Identify where docs, app code, and data files live in the repository.
Complete one onboarding task from FIRST_TASKS.md.
Submit one issue or one small PR with a clear summary.

courses.title: Bug Reports That Get Fixed
completion_criteria: Submit one bug report using the issue template.
Include reproduction steps, expected vs actual behavior, and environment details.
Attach screenshot or short video evidence.

courses.title: Docs That Unblock Teams
completion_criteria: Improve one README or docs page for beginner clarity.
Add one FAQ or troubleshooting item tied to a real issue pattern.
Get one docs change merged.

courses.title: JSON and Content Ops for Non-Coders
completion_criteria: Edit one content field in a JSON data file.
Preview the app and verify the change appears correctly.
Document the content update in a PR description.

courses.title: Accessibility Scout Basics
completion_criteria: Run one keyboard-only navigation pass on the app.
Identify at least three a11y findings with severity and location.
Submit one issue with actionable accessibility recommendations.

courses.title: UI Polish Without Coding Deeply
completion_criteria: Make one responsive UI improvement in styles.css.
Validate the result at mobile and desktop widths.
Provide before/after screenshots in the PR.

courses.title: GitHub Workflow for Beginners
completion_criteria: Create an issue and link it to a change.
Open one pull request with test steps.
Address at least one round of review feedback.

courses.title: Issue Triage and Backlog Hygiene
completion_criteria: Triage and label 10 issues using the project taxonomy.
Rewrite two vague issues into clear acceptance criteria.
Create one prioritized task list for next sprint.

courses.title: QA Playbooks for Product Releases
completion_criteria: Execute one full smoke test checklist on release candidate build.
Log pass/fail results with reproduction notes for failures.
Publish a release QA summary.

courses.title: ByteCast for Contributors
completion_criteria: Draft one ByteCast episode plan with a single learning objective.
Include a practical action step tied to a real repo task.
Publish one episode outline in markdown or JSON profile format.

courses.title: From Non-Coder to Junior Builder
prerequisites: JSON and Content Ops for Non-Coders
completion_criteria: Implement one low-risk behavior fix in app.js.
Demonstrate that the fix works with clear test steps.
Merge one reviewed code PR.

courses.title: Contributor Leadership Practicum
completion_criteria: Run one contributor support session (office hour or async review block).
Mentor one contributor from task selection to completion.
Publish a short weekly operations report with risks and next actions.
